query:
SELECT 
  tipoServico,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  SUM(valorTotal) / 100 as valor_total_reais,
  MIN(dataRealizacao) as primeira_data,
  MAX(dataRealizacao) as ultima_data
FROM servicos_execucao
WHERE (tipoServico = 'make_formando' OR tipoServico = 'make_familia')
  AND YEAR(dataRealizacao) = 2025
  AND MONTH(dataRealizacao) = 12
GROUP BY tipoServico;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT 
  tipoServico,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  SUM(valorTotal) / 100 as valor_total_reais,
  MIN(dataRealizacao) as primeira_data,
  MAX(dataRealizacao) as ultima_data
FROM servicos_execucao
WHERE (tipoServico = 'make_formando' OR tipoServico = 'make_familia')
  AND YEAR(dataRealizacao) = 2025
  AND MONTH(dataRealizacao) = 12
GROUP BY tipoServico;
